reviewtext: I installed this card in my Jornada 690, and its about twice as fast as my old Compact Flash card.  It detects itself faster without much delay,etc..  I would not recommend putting startup items on the card, and expecting them to load as fast as internal RAM (I tried that, and the card could not compete with internal RAM). But hence for a CF card this is as fast as I've used!  I recommend.
summary: Perfect for digital cameras and Handheld PC's!
